mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_pw, user_name, CASE user_org WHEN 'NC' THEN '원전' WHEN 'WP' THEN '수력' WHEN 'PP' THEN '양수' WHEN 'KP' THEN '경주변전소' END as user_org, user_org as user_org2, user_department, user_duty, user_tel, user_email, user_auth, user_update, user_start, user_last, user_tmp1, user_tmp2, user_tmp3 FROM user m where m.user_id like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') and m.user_name like concat('%',#{searchKeyword2},'%') and m.user_tmp1 like concat('%' #{switchKey}, '%') order by user_start desc limit #{startRow},#{rowsPerPage}
select user_email as email,user_id as id from user where user_tmp1 = 'y' and user_tmp2 = 'y' and user_org in(#{type},'AL')
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM user m where m.user_id like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') and m.user_name like concat('%',#{searchKeyword2},'%') and m.user_tmp1 like concat('%' #{switchKey}, '%')
SELECT count(*) FROM seis_web.user where user_id=#{id}
select count(*) from event_send_log where e_evt_id = #{id} and e_user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update event_send_log set e_mail_flag = 1 , e_mail_time = date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') where e_evt_id = #{id} and e_user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user values( #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{org}, #{department}, #{duty}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{auth}, now(), now(), now(), #{tmp1}, #{tmp2}, #{tmp3} )
